text: Ekaterina Orlova (1758-1781), was a Russian courtier. She served as lady in waiting to empress Catherine the Great in 1773-1777, and married in 1777 to her cousin Grigory Orlov. == References == * Орлова Е. Н. Письма к В. Н. Зиновьеву. 1776 г. / Публ. Н. Барышникова // Русский архив, 1877. — Кн. 3. — Вып. 9. — С. 113—115. Category:1758 births Category:1781 deaths Category:18th- century Russian people Category:Russian ladies-in-waiting Category:Burials at the Annunciation Church of the Alexander Nevsky Lavra
title: Ekaterina Orlova (courtier)
